item.title: add(bug 58138)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58138) - Conditional Formatting support for the common Color class, in addition to previous color shorts

item.title: fix(bug 58133)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58133) - Agile encryption - wrong checksum calculation

item.title: fix(bug 58113)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58113) - Regression: NullPointerException when setting cell value to null

item.title: add(bug 57893)
item.description: add by David North (bug 57893) - Add a method for obtaining all merged regions on a worksheet. This is faster for XSSFSheet than obtaining each individually by iteration.

item.title: add(bug 58036)
item.description: add by David North (bug 58036) - Add basic support for VBA macro-enabled workbooks (xlsm)

item.title: fix(bug 57744)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57744) - Fix parsing the email submission data when id contains a hyphen

item.title: fix(bug 57678)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57678) - Better handle years in mail-messages between 1980 and 1999

item.title: fix(bug 54332)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 54332) - WMF extraction failing in Tika for older PowerPoint Files

item.title: add(bug 56865)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 56865) - Limit number of bytes (by counting them) while opening office docs

item.title: add(bug 50090)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 50090) - zip bomb prevention

item.title: fix(bug 58069)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58069) - Biff8RC4 xorShort returns wrong value for unsigned shorts

item.title: fix(bug 56420)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56420) - Fix possible NullPointerException when empty cell is included in Sumif calculation

item.title: fix(bug 58040)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58040) - Log Forging

item.title: fix(bug 56328)
item.description: fix by David North (bug 56328) - Improve AreaReference to take account of the spreadsheet format version when determining whether a reference is whole-column.

item.title: fix(bug 57963)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57963) - Fix and verify in CI builds that we can compile most examples without requiring scratchpad-jar, update documentation.

item.title: fix(bug 53109)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 53109) - Correctly handle unicode strings in NameCommentRecord

item.title: add(bug 57904)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57904) - Automatically verify that the resulting source-packages can be built

item.title: fix(bug 57512)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57512) - Fix potential NPE in DateUtil for invalid dates

item.title: fix(bug 57889)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57889) - Fix potential NPE in XWPFParagraph.getNumFmt()

item.title: fix(bug 57951)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57951) - Use BigDecimal in some cases in DataFormatter.formatRawCellContents, to avoid rounding problems on JDK8

item.title: fix(bug 55410)
item.description: fix by David North (bug 55410) - Use specific ID value which prevents Excel from turning comments into giant curved arrows
